attributes.action: Make Monday 16 July 2018 a national bank holiday when England win the World Cup
attributes.additional_details: When England win the world cup life as we know it will cease to exist. England will come to a standstill. Bars will run dry. Streets will be littered with discarded white plastic furniture. This petition is in the national interest to preempt a disaster to the economy and will reduce the risk of drink driving the next day. #itscominghome
attributes.background: England are on the way to winning the world cup and we need something in place to preempt a disaster. #itscominghome
